title: Update Google Ads tracking tag to new conversion ID

requirements.summary: Replace existing Google Ads tracking tag with new conversion ID AW-17969512168
acceptanceCriteria: The Google Ads tracking tag in frontend/index.html uses conversion ID AW-17969512168
The gtag.js script loads asynchronously from the updated URL
The gtag config call references AW-17969512168
The script remains in the <head> section before </head>
No other Google Ads tracking codes remain in the HTML

file_operations.description: Update the Google Ads tracking tag in the <head> section. Replace the existing gtag.js script src URL from 'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=AW-17968689708' to 'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=AW-17969512168'. Update the gtag('config', 'AW-17968689708') call to gtag('config', 'AW-17969512168'). Ensure the script block remains in the <head> section before the closing </head> tag and maintains async loading. Remove any other Google Ads tracking code that may reference the old conversion ID.
